verses.verse: "Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are to <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H7069>buy<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>slave,<s%> he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out as a <S%H2670>free<s%> <S%H2670>man<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>payment.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> he <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H1610>alone,<s%> he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H1610>alone;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he is the <S%H1167>husband<s%> of a <S%H802>wife,<s%> then his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out with him.

<S%H518>"If<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> him a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bears<s%> him <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to her <S%H113>master,<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H1610>alone.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5650>slave<s%> <S%H559>plainly<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> 'I <S%H157>love<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> and my <S%H1121>children;<s%> I will not <S%H3318>go<s%> out as a <S%H2670>free<s%> <S%H2670>man,<s%>'

then his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to <S%H430>God,<s%> then he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H4201>doorpost.<s%> And his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H7527>pierce<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> with an <S%H4836>awl;<s%> and he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him <S%H5769>permanently.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sells<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as a <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave,<s%> she is not to <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>free<s%> as the <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>slaves<s%> <S%H3318>do.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> she is <S%H7451>displeasing<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3259>designated<s%> her for himself, then he shall let her be <S%H6299>redeemed.<s%> He does not <S%H4910>have<s%> <S%H4910>authority<s%> to <S%H4376>sell<s%> her to a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> because of his <S%H898>unfairness<s%> to her.
"And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H3259>designates<s%> her for his <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with her according to the <S%H4941>custom<s%> of <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> he <S%H3947>takes<s%> to himself <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H312>woman,<s%> he may not <S%H1639>reduce<s%> her <S%H7607>food,<s%> her <S%H3682>clothing,<s%> or her <S%H5772>conjugal<s%> <S%H5772>rights.<s%>

"And <S%H518>if<s%> he will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> [things] for her, then she shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out for <S%H2600>nothing,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> [payment of] <S%H3701>money.<s%>
"He who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"But <S%H834>if<s%> he did not <S%H6658>lie<s%> in <S%H6658>wait<s%> [for him,] but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H579>let<s%> [him] <S%H579>fall<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> you a <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> he may <S%H5127>flee.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If,<s%> however, a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2102>acts<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> so as to <S%H2026>kill<s%> him <S%H6195>craftily,<s%> you are to <S%H3947>take<s%> him [even] from My <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>
"And he who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother<s%> shall <S%H517>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"And he who <S%H1589>kidnaps<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> whether he <S%H4376>sells<s%> him or he is <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3027>possession,<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"And he who <S%H7043>curses<s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother<s%> shall <S%H517>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7378>have<s%> a <S%H7378>quarrel<s%> and <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> the <S%H7453>other<s%> with a <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with [his] <S%H106>fist,<s%> and he does not <S%H4191>die<s%> but <S%H5307>remains<s%> in <S%H4904>bed;<s%>

<S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6965>gets<s%> up and <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H1980>around<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> on his <S%H4938>staff,<s%> then he who <S%H5221>struck<s%> him shall <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished;<s%> he shall <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5414>pay<s%> for his <S%H7674>loss<s%> of <S%H7674>time,<s%> and shall <S%H7495>take<s%> <S%H7495>care<s%> of him until he is <S%H7495>completely<s%> <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave<s%> <S%H5650><s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> and he <S%H4191>dies<s%> at his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he shall be <S%H5358>punished.<s%>

<S%H518>"If,<s%> <S%H389>however,<s%> he <S%H5975>survives<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> two, <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> shall be <S%H5358>taken;<s%> for he is his <S%H3701>property.<s%>

"And [if] <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5327>struggle<s%> with each other and <S%H5062>strike<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> with <S%H2030>child<s%> so that she <S%H3318>has<s%> a <S%H3318>miscarriage,<s%> <S%H3206><s%> yet there is <S%H3808>no<s%> [further] <S%H611>injury,<s%> he shall <S%H6064>surely<s%> be <S%H6064>fined<s%> as the woman's <S%H1167>husband<s%> may <S%H7896>demand<s%> of him; and he shall <S%H5414>pay<s%> as the <S%H6414>judges<s%> [decide.]
"But <S%H518>if<s%> there is [any further] <S%H611>injury,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> [as a penalty] <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life,<s%>
<S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot,<s%>
<S%H3555>burn<s%> for <S%H3555>burn,<s%> <S%H6482>wound<s%> for <S%H6482>wound,<s%> <S%H2250>bruise<s%> for <S%H2250>bruise.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and <S%H7843>destroys<s%> it, he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> on <S%H8478>account<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

"And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5307>knocks<s%> out a <S%H8127>tooth<s%> of his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> on <S%H8478>account<s%> of his <S%H8127>tooth.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5055>gores<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall <S%H5619>surely<s%> be <S%H5619>stoned<s%> and its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall not be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> but the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall <S%H9345>go<s%> <S%H9345>unpunished.<s%>

<S%H518>"If,<s%> however, an <S%H7794>ox<s%> was <S%H8543>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%> in the <S%H5056>habit<s%> of <S%H5056>goring,<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> has been <S%H5749>warned,<s%> yet he does not <S%H8104>confine<s%> it, and it <S%H4191>kills<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> is <S%H7896>demanded<s%> of him, then he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> for the <S%H9445>redemption<s%> of his <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H7896>demanded<s%> of him.
<S%H176>"Whether<s%> it <S%H5055>gores<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him according to the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H4941>rule.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5055>gores<s%> a <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>slave,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> the owner shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his [or her] <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6605>opens<s%> a <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3738>digs<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%> and does not <S%H3680>cover<s%> it over, and an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into it,

the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%> shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution;<s%> he shall <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to its <S%H1167>owner,<s%> and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> [animal] shall <S%H1961>become<s%> his.

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> one man's <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5062>hurts<s%> another's so that it <S%H4191>dies,<s%> then they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H2673>divide<s%> its <S%H3701>price<s%> equally; and <S%H1571>also<s%> they shall <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> [ox.]

<S%H176>"Or<s%> [if] it is <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H7794>ox<s%> was <S%H8543>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%> in the <S%H5056>habit<s%> of <S%H5056>goring,<s%> yet its <S%H1167>owner<s%> has not <S%H8104>confined<s%> it, he shall <S%H9608>surely<s%> <S%H9608>pay<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> for <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> [animal] shall <S%H1961>become<s%> his.
